page.title: 19A children's birthday party
page.content: Rachel and Louise, who had birthdays on the same day, shared a party in the Church Hall one afternoon.Rachel's uncle brought his disco system and provided the music for dancing.He fixed up bright lights and introduced the games.All the children from the village school were invited and each one gave both girls a present. Pass the parcel was a popular game.The child unwrapping the final layer of paper was the winner and received a prize.Musical chairs was another good game enjoyed by all. Food had been prepared by both mothers, beefburgers,sausages,crisps,chocolate crispies,jelly and icecream.Also a decorated cake with candles for each girl,six for Rachel and seven for Louise.At the end of the party each guest was given a bag of sweets and a balloon before they went home.
